import{collection,addDoc,serverTimestamp}from'firebase/firestore';import{db}from'./firebase';const EVENTS_COLLECTION='analytics_events';export async function addEvent(_ref){let{type,label,meta={},userId=null}=_ref;try{await addDoc(collection(db,EVENTS_COLLECTION),{type,label,meta,userId,createdAt:serverTimestamp(),source:'web'});}catch(e){// Non-blocking
console.warn('analytics addEvent failed',e);}}
